title: Strengthening Business Competencies: Simulation/VR-Based Training for Enhancing Physician-Educator Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective feedback techniques in diverse clinical scenarios through VR simulations.
Learners can explain how to adapt educational theories (e.g., adult learning principles, competency-based assessment) to real-world educational contexts.
Learners can analyze their teaching style and develop improvement plans through peer assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
